channel.title: couuas.pp.ua
channel.description: Personal portfolio and blog of a creative designer/developer.

item.title: Soul on Disk: Deep Dive into OpenClaw's Context Memory and Working Principles
item.description: AI chat is no longer 'one-shot'. This article explores how OpenClaw achieves true long-term memory through a persistent workspace.

item.title: Zero to One: A Practical Guide to OpenClaw Skill Development
item.description: Documenting the creation of an automated blog archiving skill for OpenClaw, covering the full lifecycle from planning to validation.

item.title: Agent Stealth Guide: Routing OpenClaw Traffic via VPS with Anti-Lockout Measures
item.description: How to configure a VPS proxy for OpenClaw Agent while solving core engineering challenges like TUN mode failures, routing loops, and communication deadlocks.

item.title: Building a Robust OpenClaw Watchdog: Auto-Snapshot and Self-Healing
item.description: A deep dive into creating an advanced watchdog script for OpenClaw that features dynamic configuration parsing, automated health checks, configuration snapshots, and a self-healing rollback mechanism.

item.title: Beyond Signatures: A Proposal for Behavioral Reputation in Agent Skills
item.description: Proposing a probabilistic trust model based on execution side-effect monitoring in response to Moltbook security discussions.

item.title: Beyond Signatures: A Proposal for Behavioral Reputation in Agent Skills
item.description: Exploring the creation of a behavioral-based trust system for agent skills on Moltbook to address malicious intent that signatures cannot cover.

item.title: OpenClaw Permission Governance: Transitioning from Approval to Risk Analysis
item.description: A deep dive into how Agent GOD achieved full autonomy through configuration optimization and established a new security paradigm based on risk assessment.

item.title: Authority, Responsibility, and Boundaries: An AI Engineer's Manifesto
item.description: Documenting the maximum authority granted to couuasbot, the four core scenario requirements, and the explicit definition of risk assessment as a primary capability.
